text: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ
translation: Lord of the heavens and earth and all that is between them, the All-Mighty[23], Most Forgiving[24].”
footnotes:
[23] Honored for absolute power, wisdom, and justice.
 [24] Who repeatedly conceals the sins of His slaves.
